items.text: Stream API can iterate over Collections in a very straightforward manner.
items.href: Iteration Over Java Collections With High Performance - DZone Java

items.text: But forEach is very different, according to this answer on StackOverFlow and document from Oracle, JVM has to convert forEach to an iterator and call hasNext() with every item.
items.href: Iteration Over Java Collections With High Performance - DZone Java

items.text: This is why forEach is slower than the C style.
items.href: Iteration Over Java Collections With High Performance - DZone Java
